existing_data.Title: Microsoft Might Face EU Probe Over Bing AI Safety Concerns
existing_data.Description: EU Commission investigates Bing's AI for safety risks like deepfakes, and manipulation. Microsoft risks fines for non-compliance.

existing_data.Title: A healthy PC means using Bing, according to Microsoft
existing_data.Description: Microsoft adds Bing as default search engine in an attempt to help clean up your PC.

existing_data.Title: Google Reveals Two New Web Crawlers
existing_data.Description: Google has added two new web crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video.

existing_data.Title: ChatGPT To Surface Reddit Content Via Partnership With OpenAI
existing_data.Description: OpenAI and Reddit have partnered to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT.

existing_data.Title: Google Ads Restricts Brand Names & Logos From AI Image Generation
existing_data.Description: Google Ads has restricted the use of brand names and logos in AI image generation.

existing_data.Title: Google Hints At Improving Site Rankings In Next Update
existing_data.Description: Google aims to better reward high-quality content sites in the next core update.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft Under $2.1 Billion Fine From EU Over Bing AI Risks
existing_data.Description: Microsoft faces potential $2 billion fine from the EU over concerns about misinformation and manipulation risks from Bing's AI features like Copilot.

existing_data.Title: EU Commission gives Microsoft 10 days to hand over Bing AI documents
existing_data.Description: The European Commission on Friday gave Microsoft a legally binding deadline of May 27 to supply documents concerning the use of generative artificial intelligence (AI) in its Bing search engine. The order concerns two features: "Copilot in Bing," a multipurpose system that can create text and images based on prompts from the user, and "Image Creato...

existing_data.Title: YouTube Unveils New Content And Ad Offerings At Brandcast
existing_data.Description: YouTube is updating its YouTube Select program that packages top creators’ channels, adding creator takeovers and introducing a new AI-powered ad product.

existing_data.Title: TikTok now testing 60-minute video uploads
existing_data.Description: TikTok is testing longer video uploads as it continues to compete with YouTube.

existing_data.Title: Google adds two new Googlebot crawlers: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video
existing_data.Description: Google said these new crawlers are to "better support crawling of binary data that may be used for research and development."

existing_data.Title: Former Bing AI Head, Mikhail Parakhin, Joins Perplexity Advisor Board
existing_data.Description: Mikhail Parakhin, the former head of Bing Search and Microsoft Advertising at Microsoft, has announced he is now on the advisory board for Perplexity. Perplexity is a new AI search start up, which technically would be in competition with Microsoft's Bing Search and Copilot.

existing_data.Title: Order with Google For Food Delivery Going Away End Of June
existing_data.Description: Order with Google integration with Uber Eats, Door Dash, GrubHub is going away at the end of June.

existing_data.Title: Google Ads AI Summaries Live For Some Advertisers
existing_data.Description: Google Ads AI summaries, which summarize campaign performance, are rolling out to some advertisers.

existing_data.Title: EU warns Microsoft to give Bing AI risk data or face fines
existing_data.Description: The EU on Friday told Microsoft to hand over internal documents or face fines as it examines generative AI risks on the company's search engine Bing ahead of elections.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft faces EU pressure but avoids UK probe
existing_data.Description: The EU wants info from Microsoft about Bing's generative AI features, while the UK has decided not to investigate its Mistral AI partnership.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft's Bing could face fine in EU if information on AI risks is not provided
existing_data.Description: Microsoft could face fines from the European Commission if it does not provide information on risks relating to generative AI in its search engine Bing.

existing_data.Title: EU warns Microsoft’s Bing could face probes over deepfakes and false news
existing_data.Description: Brussels suspects tech giant violated content moderation law.

existing_data.Title: AI search startup adds veterans of Google, Bing as advisers
existing_data.Description: The new advisors will include former Uber Technologies Inc. executive Emil Michael, Android co-founder and Google advisor Rich Miner, and Mikhail Parakhin, the former head of Microsoft Corp.’s Bing Search, the company said.

existing_data.Title: AI Startup Perplexity Adds Ex-Uber and Bing Execs as Advisers
existing_data.Description: AI startup Perplexity has added three new advisers: Emil Michael, Rich Miner and Mikhail Parakhin, who come from Uber, Google and Bing.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft PC Manager App 'Fixes' Your PC By Restoring Bing as the Default Search Engine
existing_data.Description: Gee, thanks Microsoft! We can't imagine how that setting got changed in the first place.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft lures users to improve their PCs by doing THIS
existing_data.Description: Bill Gates-founded American technology behemoth Microsoft attempted an innovative way to make people shift from Google to its search engine Bing, as the Redmond-based company continuously markets its products.

existing_data.Title: Microsoft's 4.5-rated performance optimization tool bizarrely recommends using Bing as the default search engine to 'repair' Windows 11
existing_data.Description: Microsoft PC Manager recommends using Bing as the default search engine to "repair" your Windows device.

existing_data.Title: Pushy Microsoft app wants you to "repair" your PC by switching to Bing
existing_data.Description: The PC Manager app has been kicking around the Microsoft Store since late 2022, but it's an optional download and not something that comes pre-installed with Windows...

existing_data.Title: Two New Googlebots: GoogleOther-Image & GoogleOther-Video
existing_data.Description: Google has added two new Googlebot user agents to its lineup: GoogleOther-Image and GoogleOther-Video.

existing_data.Title: Google Locks Down Complaints Of Image Thumbnails Not Showing In Search
existing_data.Description: Google has locked down the Google support thread with complaints about image thumbnails not showing in the search results, an ongoing issue for the past few months.

existing_data.Title: Google: Sites Hit By Helpful Content Update Could See Improvements With Next Core Update If...
existing_data.Description: Google's John Mueller was asked when can a site expect to recover from the September 2023 helpful content update, assuming the site took all measures to "fix" their site.

existing_data.Title: Is Service Areas A New Google Local Ranking Factor?
existing_data.Description: A bunch of local SEOs are buzzing about a possible new local SEO Google ranking factor and are looking to confirm it.

existing_data.Title: Google AdSense Will Not Change Minimum Reporting Thresholds
existing_data.Description: Google is not going to change the minimum reporting thresholds in Google AdSense.

existing_data.Title: Many Searchers Want To Turn Off Google AI Overviews
existing_data.Description: Searchers are complaining in the Google Search help forums that they want to turn off the new Google AI Overviews.

existing_data.Title: Continued Heated Google Search Ranking Volatility Through May 16th
existing_data.Description: The May 9th Google ranking volatility is super unusual to see such heated volatility for such a long period within the Google Search rankings.

existing_data.Title: Google Local Service Ads Tests Message Multiple Businesses
existing_data.Description: Google is testing a "message multiple businesses" button in the Google Local Service Ads search results.

existing_data.Title: OpenAI and Reddit partner to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT
existing_data.Description: OpenAI and Reddit partner to bring Reddit content to ChatGPT and more via Reddit's Data API, bring new AI tools to Reddit, and make OpenAI a Reddit ad partner.
